statements: SELECT * FROM flight_paths;
SELECT drone_id, start_location, end_location FROM flight_paths;
SELECT flight_id, duration FROM flight_paths WHERE drone_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM flight_paths ORDER BY flight_date DESC;
SELECT drone_id, start_location, end_location FROM flight_paths WHERE duration > '1 hour';
SELECT drone_id, flight_id, start_location, end_location, flight_date, duration, telemetry_data FROM flight_paths ORDER BY flight_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM flight_paths WHERE start_location='New York' AND end_location='Los Angeles' ORDER BY duration ASC
SELECT drone_id, flight_id, start_location, end_location, EXTRACT(hour FROM flight_date) AS flight_hour FROM flight_paths WHERE EXTRACT(day FROM flight_date) = 15
SELECT drone_id, flight_id, start_location, end_location, flight_date, duration, telemetry_data FROM flight_paths WHERE duration > INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT * FROM flight_paths WHERE end_location = 'San Francisco' AND telemetry_data->>'altitude' > '500' ORDER BY flight_date
SELECT flight_id, start_location, end_location, flight_time FROM drone_flight_paths;
SELECT * FROM drone_flight_paths WHERE flight_id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location, flight_time FROM drone_flight_paths ORDER BY flight_time DESC;
SELECT flight_id, start_location, end_location FROM drone_flight_paths WHERE start_location = 'New York';
SELECT flight_id, start_location, end_location, flight_time FROM drone_flight_paths LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM drone_flight_paths WHERE flight_id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location, flight_time FROM drone_flight_paths WHERE start_location = 'New York';
SELECT telemetry_time, latitude, longitude, altitude, speed FROM telemetry_data WHERE flight_id = 2 ORDER BY telemetry_time DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, flight_time FROM drone_flight_paths WHERE flight_time BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT start_location, end_location, AVG(flight_time) AS average_flight_time FROM drone_flight_paths GROUP BY start_location, end_location;
SELECT * FROM drone_paths;
SELECT path_name, start_location, end_location FROM drone_paths;
SELECT id, path_name FROM drone_paths WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT map_name, coordinates FROM map_data ORDER BY map_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM drone_paths WHERE start_location = 'HQ' ORDER BY path_name DESC;
SELECT path_name, start_location, end_location FROM drone_paths WHERE end_location = 'Warehouse' AND path_name LIKE '%Route%';
SELECT path_name, end_location FROM drone_paths WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND end_location <> 'Office' ORDER BY path_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE altitude > 1000 AND temperature BETWEEN 25.5 AND 30.0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT map_name, coordinates FROM map_data WHERE map_id = 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM drone_flight_paths;
SELECT flight_id, drone_id FROM drone_flight_paths WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT telemetry_id, altitude, speed FROM telemetry_data WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT coord_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM map_coordinates ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT monitoring_id, status, alert_message FROM monitoring_data WHERE status = 'OK';
SELECT * FROM drone_flight_paths WHERE drone_id = 101;
SELECT telemetry_id, telemetry_time, altitude FROM telemetry_data ORDER BY telemetry_time DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM map_coordinates WHERE description LIKE '%park%';
SELECT monitoring_id, telemetry_time, status FROM monitoring_data WHERE status = 'critical' ORDER BY telemetry_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT m.coord_id, m.location_name, t.altitude, t.speed FROM map_coordinates m JOIN telemetry_data t ON m.coord_id = t.telemetry_id;
SELECT * FROM drone_paths;
SELECT telemetry_id, time_stamp, speed FROM telemetry_data WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT model, manufacturer FROM drone_devices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT map_id, latitude, longitude FROM map_coordinates WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT log_id, drone_id, event_type, log_datetime FROM monitoring_logs WHERE event_type = 'crash';
SELECT * FROM drone_paths WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT speed, altitude FROM telemetry_data WHERE path_id = 3;
SELECT model, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM drone_devices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM map_coordinates WHERE map_id = 5;
SELECT log_id, drone_id, event_type, log_datetime, log_details FROM monitoring_logs WHERE event_type = 'error';
